tool_description: A Football API that gives you funny quotes about our lord and saviour, Harry Maguire.
name: Harry Maguire
title: Harry Maguire

api_list.name: Get Maguire Quote
api_list.description: Get a quote and its author as a JSON response!
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://harry-maguire.p.rapidapi.com/quote"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "harry-maguire.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
